languages.text: "Поверхность Януса была сильно изменена для перевода планеты в класс {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромиров{/g}. Это мощная продовольственная база, способная снабжать разрастающийся протекторат и экспортировать еду на внешние миры. Своим процветанием Янус, по большей части, обязан губернаторскому дому Вьятт. Под его руководством мир год от года развивался, обеспечивал подати и поставки, сохраняя рабочую силу под контролем".

traits.locale_text: "Поверхность Януса была сильно изменена для перевода планеты в класс {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромиров{/g}. Это мощная продовольственная база, способная снабжать разрастающийся протекторат и экспортировать еду на внешние миры. Своим процветанием Янус, по большей части, обязан губернаторскому дому Вьятт. Под его руководством мир год от года развивался, обеспечивал подати и поставки, сохраняя рабочую силу под контролем".

languages.text: "The surface of Janus was altered extensively so the planet could be designated an {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning protectorate and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."
languages.original_text: "Поверхность Януса была сильно изменена для перевода планеты в класс {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}агромиров{/g}. Это мощная продовольственная база, способная снабжать разрастающийся протекторат и экспортировать еду на внешние миры. Своим процветанием Янус, по большей части, обязан губернаторскому дому Вьятт. Под его руководством мир год от года развивался, обеспечивал подати и поставки, сохраняя рабочую силу под контролем".

traits.locale_text: "The surface of Janus had been altered extensively so the planet could be designated as an Agri-World. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning trade empire and exporting victuals to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Wyatt. Under its leadership, the world grew ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping laborers under control."

"The surface of Janus was altered extensively so the planet could be designated an agri world. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning trade empire and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."

It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning protectorate and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."

languages.text: «La superficie de Janus fue alterada considerablemente para poder convertir el planeta en un {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}mundo agrícola{/g}. Es una fuente de comida crucial, capaz de abastecer al creciente protectorado a la vez que exporta provisiones a los mundos exteriores. Janus debe mucho a la casa Vyatt, a la que pertenecen sus gobernadores. Bajo su mandato, el mundo se vuelve más próspero año tras año, ya que garantizan la seguridad de los cargamentos y los impuestos a la vez que controlan a los trabajadores».
languages.original_text: "The surface of Janus was altered extensively so the planet could be designated an {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning protectorate and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."

traits.locale_text: «La superficie de Janus fue alterada considerablemente para poder convertir el planeta en un {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}mundo agrícola{/g}. Es una fuente de comida crucial, capaz de abastecer al creciente protectorado a la vez que exporta provisiones a los mundos exteriores. Janus debe mucho a la casa Vyatt, a la que pertenecen sus gobernadores. Bajo su mandato, el mundo se vuelve más próspero año tras año, ya que garantizan la seguridad de los cargamentos y los impuestos a la vez que controlan a los trabajadores».

languages.text: “加努斯的定位是{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}农业世界{/g}，这颗行星的地表经过全方位改造。这里是个丰饶的粮食产地，可以为不断扩大的家族领地提供足够的给养，同时向其他外部世界出口物资。加努斯之所以能繁荣发展，主要归功于行星的管理者维亚特家族。在这个家族的领导下，加努斯一年比一年繁荣。他们保障了运输和税收，所有的劳力都牢牢地控制在他们手上。”
languages.original_text: "The surface of Janus was altered extensively so the planet could be designated an {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning protectorate and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."

traits.locale_text: “加努斯的定位是{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}农业世界{/g}，这颗行星的地表经过全方位改造。这里是个丰饶的粮食产地，可以为不断扩大的家族领地提供足够的给养，同时向其他外部世界出口物资。加努斯之所以能繁荣发展，主要归功于行星的管理者维亚特家族。在这个家族的领导下，加努斯一年比一年繁荣。他们保障了运输和税收，所有的劳力都牢牢地控制在他们手上。”

languages.text: 「ヤヌスを{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}農業惑星{/g}に指定できるように、その地表を大々的に作り変えたのです。頼れる食糧基地で、急成長する保護領に食糧を供給すると同時に、他の惑星にも食糧を輸出できます。ヤヌスが栄えたのは、ビャット総督家の功績が大きいです。ビャット家の指揮の下、惑星は年々繁栄しており、労働力を厳しく管理しつつ、出荷数と税金を確保しています」
languages.original_text: "The surface of Janus was altered extensively so the planet could be designated an {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning protectorate and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."

traits.locale_text: 「ヤヌスを{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}農業惑星{/g}に指定できるように、その地表を大々的に作り変えたのです。頼れる食糧基地で、急成長する保護領に食糧を供給すると同時に、他の惑星にも食糧を輸出できます。ヤヌスが栄えたのは、ビャット総督家の功績が大きいです。ビャット家の指揮の下、惑星は年々繁栄しており、労働力を厳しく管理しつつ、出荷数と税金を確保しています」

languages.text: "Die Oberfläche von Janus wurde umfassend umgestaltet, damit der Planet als {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Agrarwelt{/g} kategorisiert werden konnte. Er ist eine leistungsstarke Nahrungsmittelfabrik und kann gleichzeitig das wachsende Protektorat versorgen und Lebensmittel in die äußeren Welten exportieren. Einen Großteil seines Wohlstands verdankt Janus dem Gouverneurshaus Vyatt. Unter dessen Führung ist die Welt Jahr um Jahr reicher geworden, hat sicher geliefert, Steuern abgeführt und die Arbeiterschaft stets unter Kontrolle gehabt."
languages.original_text: "The surface of Janus was altered extensively so the planet could be designated an {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning protectorate and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."

traits.locale_text: "Die Oberfläche von Janus wurde umfassend umgestaltet, damit der Planet als {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}Agrarwelt{/g} kategorisiert werden konnte. Er ist eine leistungsstarke Nahrungsmittelfabrik und kann gleichzeitig das wachsende Protektorat versorgen und Lebensmittel in die äußeren Welten exportieren. Einen Großteil seines Wohlstands verdankt Janus dem Gouverneurshaus Vyatt. Unter dessen Führung ist die Welt Jahr um Jahr reicher geworden, hat sicher geliefert, Steuern abgeführt und die Arbeiterschaft stets unter Kontrolle gehabt."

languages.text: « La surface de Janus a été considérablement transformée pour que la planète obtienne le statut d'{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-monde{/g}. Son abondante production de nourriture lui permet aussi bien de subvenir aux besoins du protectorat que d'exporter des vivres aux mondes extérieurs. Janus doit sa prospérité en grande partie à la maison de la gouverneure Vyatt. Sous sa direction, le monde jouit d'une croissance continue, paie les taxes et assure l'approvisionnement de vos autres planètes, tout en exerçant un contrôle ferme sur la main-d'œuvre. »
languages.original_text: "The surface of Janus was altered extensively so the planet could be designated an {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning protectorate and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."

traits.locale_text: « La surface de Janus a été considérablement transformée pour que la planète obtienne le statut d'{g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-monde{/g}. Son abondante production de nourriture lui permet aussi bien de subvenir aux besoins du protectorat que d'exporter des vivres aux mondes extérieurs. Janus doit sa prospérité en grande partie à la maison du gouverneur Vyatt. Sous sa direction, le monde jouit d'une croissance continue, paie les taxes et assure l'approvisionnement de vos autres planètes, tout en exerçant un contrôle ferme sur la main-d'œuvre. »

languages.text: "Janus'un yüzeyine yoğun bir dönüşüm geçirtilip gezegen, bir {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}zirai dünya{/g} olarak tayin edildi. Janus; filizlenen protektorayı besleyebilen, aynı zamanda dış dünyalara erzak ihraç edebilen güçlü bir gıda merkezidir. Sahip olduğu zenginliğin çoğunu, Valilik Hanesi Vyattlara borçludur. Hanenin önderliği altında dünya, her geçen yıl daha da zenginleşmiştir. Sevkiyatlar ayarlanıp vergiler bağlanmış, bu sırada da iş gücü sıkı sıkıya kontrol altında tutulmuştur."
languages.original_text: "The surface of Janus was altered extensively so the planet could be designated an {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}agri-world{/g}. It is a powerful food base, capable of supplying the burgeoning protectorate and exporting provisions to the outer worlds at the same time. Janus owes much of its prosperity to the Governor House of Vyatt. Under its leadership, the world has grown ever more prosperous year after year, securing shipments and taxes while keeping the workforce tightly controlled."

traits.locale_text: "Janus'un yüzeyine yoğun bir dönüşüm geçirtildi ve gezegen bir {g|Encyclopedia:AgriWorld}tarım dünyası{/g} olarak tayin edildi. Büyümekte olan protektorayı besleyebilen ve aynı zamanda dış dünyalara erzak ihraç edebilen güçlü bir gıda merkezidir. Janus, sahip olduğu zenginliğin çoğunu Vyatt Hanesi Valisi'ne borçludur. Onun liderliği altındaki dünya her geçen yıl daha da zenginleşmiş, sevkiyatlar ve vergiler bağlamış, bu sırada da iş gücünü sıkı sıkıya kontrol altında tutmuştur."
